text: was a Japanese classical composer. He also wrote music for anime movies, television shows and OVAs. He was born in Tokyo. His style was classical, although he also had works which were New Age, Jazz, etc. He was the son of Ryoichi Hattori and father of Takayuki Hattori. He was a producer and music supervisor for many years, and had his own publishing company, Hattori Music Publishing. He was also pianist, judge and a chairman for the Tokyo music festivals. Hattori died on June 11, 2020 in Tokyo from heart failure, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Hattori Katsuhisa & Tokyo Pops Orchestra website Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Japanese composers Category:Businesspeople from Tokyo Category:Record producers
title: Katsuhisa Hattori
